titles.title: There is a river that flows from deep within

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a river that flows from deep within
There is a fountain that frees us all from sin
Come to the waters, there is a vast supply
Come to the river that never shall run dry.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tender words I speak to my brother
Tender words he speaks to me
Tender words make all the difference
Even though we may disagree.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And the words I speak, they are spirit
They are spirit and they are life
And those tender words to each other
Chase away all division and strife.
